message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you at $200. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, how about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
